welcome:
Hi {user_mention}\! Welcome to the AI Notebook Bot\.

*Here's how to get started:*
1\. Create a project with `/newproject <name>`
2\. Upload `.pdf`, `.txt`, or `.md` files to it\.
3\. Ask questions about your documents\!

Use /help to see all commands\.
help:
*Available Commands:*
`/newproject <name>` \- Create a new project\.
`/listprojects` \- See all your projects\.
`/switchproject <name>` \- Switch to an existing project\.
`/podcast <topic>` \- Generate a podcast on a topic\.
`/mindmap <topic>` \- Generate a mind map image\.
`/lang <en|ru|de>` \- Set the response language\.
`/status` \- Check your current project and language\.
